https://callahad.github.io/disconnected-.name: ensemble
https://callahad.github.io/disconnected-.description: An app for Firefox OS that lets you share a number of musical toys that can run in your friends' devices, served from your phone, either by typing in the IP address of the phone server, or by bumping NFC devices together.
https://callahad.github.io/disconnected-.author: soledad penadés

https://mikehenrty.github.io/IRCCloudNot.name: IRCCloud Notifier
https://mikehenrty.github.io/IRCCloudNot.description: Allows you to log into IRCCloud and get alerts on new notifications. Not a full IRC client.
https://mikehenrty.github.io/IRCCloudNot.author: Nathaniel van Diepen

https://fxos.github.io/dialer/dist/app/m.name: New Dialer
https://fxos.github.io/dialer/dist/app/m.description: A replacement for the built-in dialer app.
https://fxos.github.io/dialer/dist/app/m.author: Doug Sherk

https://mikehenrty.github.io/fxos-shb-pl.name: Homebar Plus
https://mikehenrty.github.io/fxos-shb-pl.description: Add show windows, and kill app button to the software home button bar
https://mikehenrty.github.io/fxos-shb-pl.author: Michael Henretty

https://callahad.github.io/fxos-tabswitc.name: Tab Switcher Shortcut
https://callahad.github.io/fxos-tabswitc.description: Adds a button to the browser that immediately opens the tab switcher
https://callahad.github.io/fxos-tabswitc.author: Dan Callahan

https://sunbox.github.io/fxos_addon_Stat.name: Status Bar Temperature
https://sunbox.github.io/fxos_addon_Stat.description: Adds the current local temperature to the status bar
https://sunbox.github.io/fxos_addon_Stat.author: André Fiedler

https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-s.name: Sound Switch
https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-s.description: Toggle sounds on and off in utilities tray. Only media volume and ringtones/notifications volume would be affected.
https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-s.author: Eddie Lin

https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-d.name: Draggable Home Button
https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-d.description: Adds a draggable home button to the screen.
https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-d.author: Eddie Lin

https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-y.name: Yellow Mask
https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-y.description: Adds a yellow mask to protect your eyes.

https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-n.name: NFC Switch
https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-n.description: Toggle NFC on and off in utilities tray.
https://elin-moco.github.io/fxos-addon-n.author: Eddie Lin

https://elin-moco.github.io/ble-explorer.name: BLE Explorer
